article_title: Netflix announces $100M relief fund after TV and film production halted
article_description: When it comes to the entertainment industry  the COVID 19 outbreak isn t just affecting movie theaters   it s also halted TV and film production around the world  For Netflix  that s included production on high profile titles like  The Witcher  and  Stranger
